LanguageData.AWL_PenetratingPowerText: The bullets of this weapon possess penetration capability. They can cause damage to a number of units equivalent to the penetration power value at most.
LanguageData.AWL_ShieldPenetrationText: Whether the bullets of this weapon can penetrate shields.
LanguageData.AWL_PenetratingPowerCostByShield: Penetration power consumption for shield penetration
